titleStmt.title: An excellent poeme, vpon the longing of a blessed heart which loathing the world, doth long to be with Christ. With an addition, vpon the definition of loue. Compiled by Nicholas Breton, Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Bradock], for Iohn Browne, and Iohn Deane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
